mapper.select:
SELECT tppb.project_period_id AS projectPeriodId, tppb.project_period_name AS projectPeriodName, tppb.project_period_parent_id AS projectPeriodParentId, tppb.project_period_level AS projectPeriodLevel, tppb.project_period_url AS projectPeriodUrl, tppb.is_click AS isClick, tppb.sort AS sort FROM tb_pro_period_base tppb
ORDER BY tppb.sort ASC
